A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well\, this is not an average Star Wars movie.  It is a politically motivated\, sexist propaganda movie which displays men are impulsive and evil while women are righteous and balanced.  Had this film come out a year earlier\, it may even help Hilary wins the election.  No wonder JJ and Lucas opposed the direction of the movie\, it is an ultra left wing\, feminist movie for women.  As for the movie itself\, it is like watching the entire series of Battlestar Galactica in just two and a half hours only more boring.  I did like the special effects and the new jedi powers being used which is why I am giving it 2/5.
